nodes.text: Finn and Poe Team Up! is a young-readers book in the World of Reading series that adapts scenes from Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. The book, a level one title, was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on June 14, 2016. The book comprises 32 pages, and is intended for children ages six through eight.

This level 1 early reader retells a favorite scene from Star Wars: The Force Awakens. Featuring beautiful full-color illustrations, this World of Reading book is perfect for little Star Wars fans who are ready to read on their own.
